name: Life Story
description: Complete the Master Chief Saga playlist.
lockedDescription: Complete the Master Chief Saga playlist.
tutorial: To get this achievement, complete the Master Chief Saga Playlist located in the Cross-game section in the campaign lobby. This playlist contains every mission from Halo:CE through Halo 4.

name: Just Getting Started
description: Kill 100 enemies or players.
lockedDescription: Kill 100 enemies or players.
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 enemies (campaign or multiplayer). Easily obtainable by playing normally.

name: Balaho's Most Wanted
description: Kill 100 Grunts.
lockedDescription: Kill 100 Grunts.
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Grunts in PVE mode (Campaign, Firefight, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally.

name: The One Percent
description: Kill 100 Elites.
lockedDescription: Kill 100 Elites.
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Elites in PVE mode (Campaign, Firefight, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally.

name: Spoilsport
description: Kill 100 Jackals.
lockedDescription: Kill 100 Jackals.
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Jackals in PVE mode (Campaign, Firefight, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally.

name: Going Bananas
description: Kill 100 Brutes.
lockedDescription: Kill 100 Brutes.
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Brutes in PVE mode (Campaign, Firefight). Easiet method: Start a Custom Firefight match in Halo:Reach and set all the enemies to be Brutes, and set the player traits so you are invinicible and have a 300% damage boost.

name: Hunters Hunted
description: Kill 50 Hunters.
lockedDescription: Kill 50 Hunters.
tutorial: Easiet method: Start a Custom Firefight match in Halo:Reach and set all the enemies to be Hunters, and set the player traits so you are invinicible and have a 300% damage boost.

name: Checkmate
description: Kill 100 Watchers.
lockedDescription: Kill 100 Watchers.
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Watchers in PVE mode (Campaign, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing Halo 4 normally.

name: I Was Wondering What Would Break First
description: Kill 100 Knights.
lockedDescription: Kill 100 Knights.
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Knights in PVE mode (Campaign, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally.

name: Pest Control
description: Kill 100 Crawlers.
lockedDescription: Kill 100 Crawlers.
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Crawlers in PVE mode (Campaign, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally, but can be sped up by playing the campaign mission Midnight.

name: Thanks A Killion
description: Kill 20,000 enemies or players.
lockedDescription: Kill 20,000 enemies or players.
tutorial: This achievement can be unlocked by playing normally with patience. To speed it up, play Firefight in Halo:Reach or Halo 3:ODST to rack up kills quicker.

name: Medal Completionist
description: Collect 10,000 campaign or playlist medals.
lockedDescription: Collect 10,000 campaign or playlist medals.
tutorial: This achievement can be unlocked by playing campaign normally with patience.

name: The Guardians Are Coming
description: Get killed by the Guardians.
lockedDescription: Get killed by the Guardians.
tutorial: This can be done on every multiplayer map that has any death boundries. Example: Load the map Terminal in Halo 2 and die from the train.

name: Bite The Hand
description: Kill a 343 developer in matchmaking or someone who has this achievement.
lockedDescription: Kill a 343 developer in matchmaking or someone who has this achievement.
tutorial: Nearly everyone has this achievement (it spreads faster then COVID-19), so this shouldnt take more then a match or two. Just kill players in matchmaking until you get it 😃.

name: Mystery Achievement
description: Inscrutable. Mysterious.
lockedDescription: Inscrutable. Mysterious.
tutorial: In a Custom game lobby, edit and save a gametype. When the promtp to enter the name appears, enter in '.fortune'. This will reveal a fun easter egg and the achievement will unlock.

name: Where Am I?

lockedDescription: Play a multiplayer or co-op game at least 3 months after your first game.
tutorial: For this one, just stick with the game for 3 months. This one can not be unlocked by changing your system's date, as it is checked by the server. But this is Halo after all, so sticking with it should be easy!

name: Veteran
description: Complete all campaigns on Normal difficulty.
lockedDescription: Complete all campaigns on Normal difficulty.
tutorial: Complete Halo:CE through Halo 4 on atleast Normal difficulty. This achievement will unlock by default if you beat the campaigns on Heroic or Legendary as well.

name: Arrival
description: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 1 on The Pillar of Autumn.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 1 on The Pillar of Autumn.
tutorial: The terminal is located near where you meet Captain Keyes. There is a computer screen that is flashing the words 'Incoming Message', that is the terminal.

name: Sacrifice
description: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 2 on Halo.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 2 on Halo.
tutorial: The terminal is in the 'this cave is not a natural formation' cave when you are driving you Warthog, hidden in a small alley.

name: Splinters
description: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 3 on The Truth and Reconciliation.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 3 on The Truth and Reconciliation.
tutorial: The terminal is located in the room where you fight a sword Elite, up on the platform with a ramp.

name: Idle Hands
description: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 4 on The Silent Cartographer.
tutorial: The terminal is located in the center of the island, where you encounter two Hunters. It is on the wall of the center structure.

name: Hitchhikers May Be Escaping Convicts
description: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 5 on Assault on the Control Room.
tutorial: The terminal is located near where you get a Banshee, hidden beneath the massive pillar in that dips into the snow.

name: Bearly Contained
description: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 6 on 343 Guilty Spark.
tutorial: The terminal is located near the end of the mission. When you are going up the elevator, jump off of it onto the cieling of the stucture to get to the terminal.

name: Quis custodiet ipsos custodes?
description: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 7 on The Library.
tutorial: The terminal is located on the 3rd level, when you are in the outer ring of the floor. You will need to jump around the bumps in order to get to the terminal.

name: Memories
description: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 8 on Two Betrayals.
tutorial: The terminal is located at the very begining of the level. Turn around as soon as you start and walk around the ring shape walkway, and the terminal is located at the end.

name: Mind Games
description: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 9 on Keyes.
tutorial: The terminal is located beneath where the 'flood Captain Keyes' is at.

name: Kilotons of Fun
description: Halo CE: Activate Terminal 10 on The Maw.
tutorial: The terminal is mid-mission, on the wall of screens that show an image of Spartan Linda.

name: Dear Diary...
description: Halo CE: Activate all Halo: CE Terminals.
tutorial: Activate all 10 terminals in Halo:CE. Watch Maka91's guide for all locations!

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Iron
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Iron skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: At the start of the Pillar of Autumn, once out of the cryotube, turn around and the skull is behind one of the cylinders near the back.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Mythic
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Mythic skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: At the start of Halo, the skull is hidden at the base of the waterfall.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Boom
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Boom skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: Above the cliff where you usually drive the Warthog into, the skull is hidden. Walk up the cliff and you can pick it up.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Foreign
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Foreign skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: In the ship bay in the left left corner, run to the doors as fast as possible. The door is usually locked, but when the enemies spawn in they will open the door. In that door is the skull.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Famine
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Famine skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: At the start of the Silent Cartographer turn left and head to the big rock hill. Climb up it and the skull will be up their.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Bandana
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Bandanna skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: On this mission Silent Cartographer, you will need full overshields and a plasma grenade (overshields are near the entrance of the skulls area). Grenade launch up onto the hallways ceiling, which make take a few attempts.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Fog
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Fog skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: On Assualt on the Control Room, in one of the rooms you walk through, grenade jump into the center pillars window.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Malfunction
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Malfunction skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: On Assault on the Control Room in the large room undergound you come aross in a Tank, get out of the Scorpion and the skull will be on a lower pillar with a ladder.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Recession
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Recession skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: On 343 Guilty Spark, near the entrance where you are supposed to head through, instead continue left and drop down. The skull will be behind a tree.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Black Eye
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Black Eye skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: On The Library, at the end of the very first area you walk through, grenade jump into the rafter and the skull will be inside.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Eye Patch
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Eye Patch skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: On The Library, at the end of the level, instead of walking into the blue beam, turn right through the area and walk all the way to the end. The skull will be between two pillars.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Pinata
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Pinata skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: On Two Betrayals, once you get a Banshee at the end of the mission, fly back from where you came. The skull is on the cliff above the tunnel.

name: Skulltaker Halo: CE: Grunt Birthday Party
description: Halo CE: Find and claim the Grunt Birthday Party skull in remastered mode.
tutorial: On The Maw, at the section where Foehammer flies above you and the countdown briefly stops, the skull is on the pillar to the right side.

name: Headhunter
description: Halo CE: Find and claim all Skulls in Halo: CE.
tutorial: Collect all 13 skulls throughout the game. Watch Maka91's guide for all locations.

name: Birth of a Spartan
description: Halo CE: Complete every level of the game on Normal difficulty.
tutorial: Beat every level of Halo:CE on atleast Normal. This achievement will also unlock for Heroic and Legendary completion.

name: Believe in a Hero
description: Halo CE: Complete every level of the game on Heroic difficulty.
tutorial: Beat every level of Halo:CE on atleast Heroic. This achievement will also unlock for Legendary completion.

name: Living Legend
description: Halo CE: Complete every level of the game on Legendary difficulty.
tutorial: Beat every level of Halo:CE on Legendary. You can do it!

name: Overshields are for Sissies
description: Halo CE: Complete the level The Pillar of Autumn on Legendary without picking up an overshield.
tutorial: Simply beat the Pillar of Autumn without picking up an Overshield 😃

name: Walk It Off
description: Halo CE: Complete The Pillar of Autumn on Legendary without picking up a health kit.
tutorial: Simply beat the Pillar of Autumn without picking up a healthkit. Be careful, as some can easily be picked up near doorways. )

name: How Pedestrian
description: Halo CE: Complete Halo without entering a vehicle.
tutorial: Beat the level Halo without gettting into the given Warthog. Run Spartan, run! )

name: That Just Happened
description: Halo CE: Complete The Library on Heroic or Legendary difficulty without dying.
tutorial: Play on Heroic, and take it nice and slow. Take out the SPNKR rocket launcher flood as fast as possible, as they are the most dangerous.

name: Look Out for the Little Guys
description: Halo CE: Complete Two Betrayals on Legendary difficulty without killing any Grunts.
tutorial: Connect in a second controller or get a co-op friend, and have them play through the mission while you sit back and do nothing. Or take a risk and just try not to kill any Grunts in solo play.

name: Leave It Where It Lay
description: Halo CE: Complete Two Betrayals on Legendary difficulty without picking up a new weapon.
tutorial: Turn on the Bandana skull and connect in a second controller or get a co-op friend, and have them play through the mission while you make sure you don't pick up a new weapon.

name: Tying Up Loose Ends
description: Halo CE: Kill every Elite on the level Keyes on Heroic or Legendary difficulty.
tutorial: Ensure you kill the Elites that are at the start,  near the hole you are supposed to jump in! Take your time and ensure you kill every single enemy/Elite in the level. Look through every hallway, nook, and corner to ensure you get the achievement..

name: A Fine Choice
description: Halo CE: Complete a Halo: CE playlist.
tutorial: Complete any campaign playlist for Halo:CE, located in the playlist lobby.

name: Excellent Taste
description: Halo CE: Complete three Halo: CE playlists.
tutorial: Complete any three campaign playlist for Halo:CE, located in the playlist lobby.

name: Like a Fine Wine
description: Halo CE: Complete the Halo: CE LASO Campaign playlist.
tutorial: Watch full guides for easiest completion! There is also an exploit, that if you can find someone who has a checkpoint on the last mission for the LASO playlist, it will give you the achievement if you beat 'The Maw' from that checkpoint. Otherwise, good luck.

name: You Are The Weapon
description: Halo CE: Kill a Hunter with one pistol round.
tutorial: Simply shoot any Hunter in the back with a pistol. The mission 'The Silent Cartographer' has multiple Hunters to fight.

name: Madrigal Debut
description: Halo CE: Trigger a hidden music cue in Halo: CE.
tutorial: This is a secret easter egg. Once you get the Banshee, fly up to the second highest floor of the structure seen in the video, and wait for the beautiful music...

name: My Buddy Chips
description: Halo CE: Fight alongside Chips Dubbo and listen to his words of wisdom.
tutorial: Chibs Dubbo is a marine you fight along side in every Halo game. You can find him randomly on the mission Pillar of Autumn, or any mission where you fight with marines.

name: No Smoking
description: Halo CE: Disapprovingly look at Captain Keyes' abandoned pipe.
tutorial: On the mission Keyes, when you are near the 'Flood' Captain Keyes, look at the tenticle hanging from the side, and you will see his smoking pipe and get the achievement.

name: T-Rex
description: Halo CE: Find the hidden Rex sign on The Maw.
tutorial: During the Warthog run, you will come across the large gap you need to drive over. When you jump the gab, drive slightly left so you land on the top of the ramp. Then get out and go into the hallway, where you will find the easter egg.

name: Thirsty Grunt
description: Halo CE: Listen to the Thirsty Grunt talk about his eating habits.
tutorial: Near the end of Warthog run, after the Foehammer section, inside one of the shortcuts their will be a hallway. At the end of the hallway you will find a Grunt with a big, milky thirst.

name: Megg
description: Halo CE: It's a sign.
tutorial: This is an easter egg with multiple steps, watch Maka91's guide to see everything.

name: Get Me Out of Here!
description: Halo CE: Ride in a Pelican for several seconds on the level 343 Guilty Spark.
tutorial: At the start of the mission, walk to the front of the Pelican and jump onto it, and stay on as long as you can while it flies away.

name: Feet Firmly Planted
description: Halo CE: Complete a level without jumping.
tutorial: Simply play through the mission and do NOT jump. To get over the pipes, just walk into them repeatedly

name: Before and After
description: Halo CE: Complete every level of the game having seen it in both classic and remastered mode.
tutorial: Use the back button / TAB button and view every level in both classic and anniversary grapics.

name: Standard Operating Brocedure
description: Complete any co-op level on Normal difficulty.
tutorial: Grab a friend and play a mission (Heoric or Legendary for even more achievements)! If you have no friends, I am sorry. But you can also plug in a second controller.

name: Brovershield
description: Complete any co-op level on Heroic difficulty.
tutorial: Grab a friend and play a mission on Heroic (or Legendary for another achievements)! If you have no friends, I am sorry. But you can also plug in a second controller.

name: He's Unstoppable
description: Halo CE: Complete any level on Heroic difficulty or higher without taking health damage.
tutorial: Grab a friend or second controller and play a mission on Heroic while you hide the entire time to ensure you dont take damage.

name: The Good, The Bad, and The Dead
description: Collect 9,000 campaign or playlist medals.
lockedDescription: Collect 9,000 campaign or playlist medals.
tutorial: This achievement can be unlocked with normal play and patience.

name: A Day To Remember
description: Halo CE: Play Halo: CE on the 15th of any month.
tutorial: Load into any campaign level/multiplayer map on the 15th of any month. This is because Halo:CE launched on November 15h, 2001!

name: Goat Roped
description: Halo CE: Halo CE: Complete all Halo: CE Legendary campaign missions in under 3 hours.
tutorial: For this achievement, you WILL need to learn how to speedrun. Watch Naked Eli's amazing guides, and you will become a Halo:CE Speedrun master in no time!

description: Halo 2: Beat the par time on Metropolis.
tutorial: Beat the mission Metropolis within 15 minutes. You can beat the level in 5 minutes by driving past everything.

name: YOLO Strats
description: Halo 2: Beat the par time on The Arbiter.
tutorial: Beat the mission The Arbiter within 15 minutes. You can beat the level in 5 minutes by running past everything and using camo strategically

name: Reed the Strategy
description: Halo 2: Beat the par time on The Oracle.
tutorial: Beat the mission The Oracle within 25 minutes. This is a harder mission to speedrun and a lot of killing is required. Watch Naked Eli's guide for best tips.

name: So You Don't Want the Tank?
description: Halo 2: Beat the par time on Delta Halo.
tutorial: Beat the mission within Delta Halo 15 minutes. You can beat the mission within 5 minutes by getting out of bounds and launching a Ghost with a grenade.

name: I Regret Nothing
description: Halo 2: Beat the par time on Regret.
tutorial: Beat the mission Regret within 15 minutes. Using strategic tricks you can skip some sections and skip enemy loadzones.

name: Terminal Velocity
description: Halo 2: Beat the par time on Sacred Icon.
tutorial: Beat the mission Sacred Icon within 15 minutes. Using strategic camo you can skip most enemies.

name: Hot Zone
description: Halo 2: Beat the par time on Quarantine Zone.
tutorial: Beat the mission Quarantine Zone within 15 minutes. Mission can beat done in about 5 minutes by driving past most enemies, and skipping the entire gondola section by jumping into a pillar.

name: Force of Will
description: Halo 2: Beat the par time on Gravemind.
tutorial: Beat the mission Gravemind within 20 minutes. This is an incredibly hard mission to speedrun. It is recommended to do this one on Easy difficulty for this specific achievement.

name: No Man's Land
description: Halo 2: Beat the par time on Uprising.
tutorial: Beat the mission Uprising within 15 minutes. This mission can be done in 2 minutes by using an amazing and easy to do skip.

name: Feeling Charitable
description: Halo 2: Beat the par time on High Charity.
tutorial: Beat the mission High Charity within 15 minutes. This mission can be done in 5 minutes by running past most enemies.

name: Are We There Yet?
description: Halo 2: Beat the par time on The Great Journey.
tutorial: Beat the mission The Great Journey within 15 minutes. First half of the mission you can drive/run past most enemies. At the end you can use a trick to beat the ending boss battle with a Banshee.

name: Going Nowhere Fast
description: Halo 2: Beat par time on all Halo 2 levels.
tutorial: Beat every mission within its par time. Watch Naked Eli's guides for all speedrunning tricks!

name: Bomb Squad
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on Cairo Station.
tutorial: Beat Cairo Station with a score of 14,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score.

name: Objective Secured
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on Outskirts.
tutorial: Beat Outskirts with a score of 8,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score, this mission is pretty easy if you kill everything.

name: Ripple Fire
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on Metropolis.
tutorial: Beat Metropolis with a score of 9,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score, this mission is pretty easy if you kill every vehicle.

name: Heresy Will Not Stay My Feet
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on The Arbiter.
tutorial: Beat The Arbiter with a score of 7,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score.

name: Leave None Alive
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on The Oracle.
tutorial: Beat The Oracle with a score of 16,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score.

name: Boundless
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on Delta Halo.
tutorial: Beat Delta Halo with a score of 10,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score. This one is easy if you just kill every vehicle.

name: Fists of Fury
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on Regret.
tutorial: Beat Regret with a score of 8,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score.

name: Guided Tour
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on Sacred Icon.
tutorial: Beat Sacred Icon with a score of 7,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score.

name: The Doctor Is In
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on Quarantine Zone.
tutorial: Beat Quarantine Zone with a score of 7,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score.

name: Official Business
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on Gravemind.
tutorial: Beat Graveminde with a score of 11,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score (May be hard as Gravemind is a hard mission!).

name: The Hype Is Real
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on Uprising.
tutorial: Beat Uprising with a score of 9,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score.

name: Scorched Earth
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on High Charity.
tutorial: Beat High Charity with a score of 9,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score.

name: Frequent Flyer Miles
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on The Great Journey.
tutorial: Beat The Great Journey with a score of 8,000. Recommended difficulty is Legendary, as it gives 4X the score.

name: Arcade Owner
description: Halo 2: Beat the par score on every Halo 2 level.
tutorial: Beat the par score for every mission in Halo 2! Make sure to play on Legendary for most missions, as it gives 4X the score per kill.

name: Curious
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 1 on Cairo Station.
tutorial: Terminal 1 is located when you reach the same room the tutorial mission takes place in, in the far left corner with a flashing 'Incoming Message' screen.

name: Inquisitive
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 2 on Outskirts.
tutorial: Terminal 2 is located near the end of the mission on the beach, inside of a small building.

name: Examiner
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 3 on Metropolis.
tutorial: Terminal 3 is located when you enter the building that the Scarab eventually walks over. It is near the back by the first set of stairs.

name: Inspector
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 4 on The Arbiter.
tutorial: Terminal 4 is located in the room with the fusion coil conveyer belt. It is in the back on the 2nd level.

name: Fascinated
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 5 on The Oracle.
tutorial: Terminal 5 is located in the room you drop down into, on the left side attached to the wall.

name: Enchanted
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 6 on Delta Halo.
tutorial: Terminal 6 is located in the building where you activate the bridge, it is right near the activation switch to the left.

name: Enamored
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 7 on Regret.
tutorial: Terminal 7 is located in the building with the massive holograms of Regret, on the left side behind the hologram.

name: Determined
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 8 on Sacred Icon.
tutorial: Terminal 8 is located near the end of the level in the area where you stop falling briefly, near the right side wall.

name: Delighted
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 9 on Quarantine Zone.
tutorial: Terminal 9 is located in one of the burning structures you venture through, on the bottom right hand side of the structure.

name: Knowledgable
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 10 on Gravemind.
tutorial: Terminal 10 is located in the first 'dome' pit area, on the far end near the left side attached to the wall.

name: Scholar
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 11 on Uprising.
tutorial: Terminal 11 is located near the end of the mission, in the pit where you encounter the wraiths. It is on the upper level, behind one of the pillar walls.

name: Reviewer
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 12 on High Charity.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 12 on High Charity.
tutorial: Terminal 12 is in the destroyed room before the gravity lift, directly left of the entrance.

name: Obsessed
description: Halo 2: Activate Terminal 13 on The Great Journey.
tutorial: Terminal 13 is located in one of the jail cells on the upper right side.

name: Walking Encyclopedia
description: Halo 2: Activate all Halo 2 Terminals.
tutorial: Find all 13 Terminals located in Halo 2: Anniversary's campaign. Watch Maka91's great guide to see the locations for all of them!

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: That's Just…Wrong
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the That's Just...Wrong Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission 'The Armory', do not initially get into the elevator with Johnson. Wait until he says 'Would it help if I said please?'. From there continue on and the skull will be sitting on a crate that you can pick up through the trams doors.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Thunderstorm
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Thunderstorm Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission Cairo Station, after coming out of the room from the tutorial mission, the skull is on the upper floor near the trams rails, in a garbage can.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Blind
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Blind Skull.
tutorial: At the start of the mission Outskirts, jump out of bounds near the first doorway, and the skull is in the back alley next to a camera.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: IWHBYD
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the IWHBYD Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission Outskirts...watch the guide for this one, it is a weird one. In short, you need to activate 7 checkpoints exactly in order to have a chance for it to spawn.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Catch
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Catch Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission Metropolis, in the dome area where you first see a Scarab, climb the arch to the top and the skull will be on the left side.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Grunt Birthday Party
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Grunt Birthday Party Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission The Arbiter, when you get to the area that gives you a Heretic Banshee, fly all the way down to the middle structure, where the skull is tucked away under the cieling.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Famine
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Famine Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission The Oracle, in the room you initially drop down into, on the opposite side grenade jump up, and the skull will on the right side next to two Flood.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Envy
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Envy Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission Delta Halo, in the ending area with a bunch of Shade turrets, climb up onto the back structure and grenade launch to the roof of the next. Two Elites will be doing some weird dance next to the skull.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Assassins
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Assassins Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: On the mission Regret, at the structure where the first gondola ride ends, jump around the outside to the opposite end of the structure. The skull will be on a small ledge with two dancing camo Elites.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Mythic
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Mythic Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission Sacred Icon, in the area where you drop into a Flood infected room, jump up onto the crates, and the skull will be in the last entrance to the rafter.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Sputnik
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Sputnik Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission Quarntine Zone, at the very start of the mission, turn around and backtrack all the way to the end to the first area. The skull will be on the edge of the large glowing pit.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Anger
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Anger Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission Gravemind, in the same pit area as the terminal, get up onto the upper right edge of the area. A Grunt with a Fuel Rod will spawn, kill it, and the skull will be at the very end of the ridge (along with the Cortana doll achievement!).

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Ghost
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Ghost Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY with SPUTNIK SKULL ENABLED. On the mission Uprising, in the ending area the skull is in the cieling of the doorway that leads into the mountain and the next area.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Iron
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Iron Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission High Charity, in the ending area when you take the gravity lift, look up hold as you hold the button that picks up weapons while going up the lift. You will pick up the skull about halfway through the ride.

name: Skulltaker Halo 2: Black Eye
description: Halo 2: Find and claim the Black Eye Skull on Legendary.
tutorial: MUST BE ON LEGENDARY DIFFICULTY. On the mission The Great Journey, at the end of the Banshee segment, the skull is on a high ledge of the giant structure. Watch the guide for specific route.

name: Trophy Collector
description: Halo 2: Find and claim all Skulls in Halo 2.
tutorial: Collect all 15 skulls in Halo 2's campaign. Watch Maka91's great guide too see the location of every one!

name: And So It Begins...
description: Halo 2: Collect the Master Chief toy in Delta Halo.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Collect the Master Chief toy in Delta Halo.
tutorial: On the mission Delta Halo, the Master Chief is outside of the playable level on a small peak. You will need a Ghost to drive up the cliffside and drive to the peak.

name: Regrettable Turn of Events
description: Halo 2: Collect the Prophet of Regret toy in Regret.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Collect the Prophet of Regret toy in Regret.
tutorial: On the mission Regret, the Regret toy is on a structure with the broken bridge, on the roof. Grenade launch over to the structure and then grenade jump onto of the right side to get the toy.

name: The Will of the Prophets
description: Halo 2: Collect the Arbiter toy in Sacred Icon.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Collect the Arbiter toy in Sacred Icon.
tutorial: On the mission Sacred Icon, the toy is hidden in the rafters, similar to the Mythic skull. Watch Maka91's guide for specific location.

name: Chieftain of the Brutes
description: Halo 2: Collect the Tartarus toy in Quarantine Zone.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Collect the Tartarus toy in Quarantine Zone.
tutorial: On the mission Quarantine Zone, at the very end of the mission, the Tartarus toy is ontop of the stucture that you will need to grenade launch up to.

name: Don't Make a Girl a Promise
description: Halo 2: Collect the Cortana toy in Gravemind.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Collect the Cortana toy in Gravemind.
tutorial: On the mission Gravemind, the Cortana toy is in the exact spot of the Anger skull, which is on the top right wall of the first open area you encounter.

name: My Work is Done
description: Halo 2: Collect the Librarian toy in Uprising.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Collect the Librarian toy in Uprising.
tutorial: On the mission Uprising, the Librarian toy is ontop of a small ledge that you will need to either grenade launch up onto, or carefully climb the mountain walls.

name: I Like Crazy
description: Halo 2: Collect the Rampant Cortana toy in High Charity.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Collect the Rampant Cortana toy in High Charity.
tutorial: On the mission High Charity, in the first room you enter, the rampant Cortana toy is ontop of the rock pillar near the exit of the room.

name: Pyrrhic Solution
description: Halo 2: Collect the Didact toy in The Great Journey.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Collect the Didact toy in The Great Journey.
tutorial: On the mission The Great Journey, you will need to save a Spectre vehicle to use at the end of the mission, as you will need it to drive outside the level and climb the mountain near the Citadel building, where the Didact toy sits on top of the mountain.

name: Toybox
description: Halo 2: Collect all eight Halo toys.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Collect all eight Halo toys.
tutorial: Collect all 8 toy easter eggs in Halo 2: Anniversary's campaign. Watch Maka91's great guide for the location of every one.

name: Warrior
description: Halo 2: Complete every level of the game on Normal difficulty.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete every level of the game on Normal difficulty.
tutorial: Complete every level on atleast Normal difficulty. Will automaticly unlock if you complete the game on Heroic or Legendary difficulty.

name: Hero
description: Halo 2: Complete every level of the game on Heroic difficulty.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete every level of the game on Heroic difficulty.
tutorial: Complete every level on atleast Heroic difficulty. Will automaticly unlock if you complete the game on Legendary difficulty.

name: Legendary Anniversary
description: Halo 2: Complete every level of the game on Legendary difficulty.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete every level of the game on Legendary difficulty.
tutorial: Complete every level Legendary difficulty. You can do it Spartan!

name: Seconds
description: Halo 2: Complete a Halo 2 playlist.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete a Halo 2 playlist.
tutorial: Complete any Halo 2 Playlist from the campaign playlist lobby located in the main menu.

name: Connoisseur
description: Halo 2: Complete three Halo 2 playlists.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete three Halo 2 playlists.
tutorial: Complete any three Halo 2 Playlist from the campaign playlist lobby located in the main menu.

name: Six Pedals, Four Directions
description: Halo 2: Drive a Scorpion while playing as the Arbiter.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Drive a Scorpion while playing as the Arbiter.
tutorial: On the mission Quarntine Zone, you will encounter an enemy Scorpion Tank in the first massive room you enter, near the back. Hijack it and kill the driver, then hop in!

name: Betcha can't stick it...
description: Halo 2: Stick a Plasma Grenade to a Stealth Elite on Outskirts.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Stick a Plasma Grenade to a Stealth Elite on Outskirts.
tutorial: On Outskirts with Legendary diffuclty on and the Assassin Skull acitvated, simply stick an Elite that is in camouflage. Or use Maka91's guide!

name: Cowardly Grunt
description: Halo 2: Listen to the Cowardly Grunt's woes.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Listen to the Cowardly Grunt's woes.
tutorial: On the mission Uprising, once you get inside the main structure with multiple drop down, A cowardly Grunt will be hiding in the corner on the bottom floor.

name: Siege of Ivory Tower
description: Halo 2: Listen to a hidden music cue in Halo 2.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Listen to a hidden music cue in Halo 2.
tutorial: Load up a Custom game on Ivory Tower, and head back to where the elvator is at. Then stand in the right corner where the door as it by the wall and wait. After a couple minutes, a secret song with play and youll get the achievement.

name: THE Chips Dubbo?
description: Halo 2: Fight alongside the legendary Chips Dubbo and listen to his words.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Fight alongside the legendary Chips Dubbo and listen to his words.
tutorial: On the mission Outskirts, stand in the Hallway with Johnson and the other marines and wait for them to talk. Restart the mission and repeat until Chips Dabbo talks!

name: Rex Sword
description: Halo 2: Grab the energy sword on the level Outskirts.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Grab the energy sword on the level Outskirts.
tutorial: On Outskirts, you'll need to jump outside the level onto the rooftops and follow a path to get into a caved in wall. Inside this wall will be a secret (An Enery Sword and the word REX written in shotgun shells)!

name: 10 Minutes Too Early
description: Halo 2: In The Oracle, find the holo-drone before the Heretic Leader activates it.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: In The Oracle, find the holo-drone before the Heretic Leader activates it.
tutorial: On the mission The Oracle in the first room you fight the Flood in, jump up onto the cieling rafters, then grenade jump into the far back right vent opening. The 'Holodrone' will be sitting in the vent.

name: HI BEN
description: Halo 2: Oh, hi!
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Oh, hi!
tutorial: On the mission Regret, grenade launch yourself towards the first structure you aren't meant to get to. Head inside the building, and in the corner of the room look up and zoom in on the ceiling. You'll see a secret message!

name: Animal Habitat
description: Halo 2: Spot the hippo on the walls of Headlong in classic multiplayer.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Spot the hippo on the walls of Headlong in classic multiplayer.
tutorial: Load up a Custom game on the map Headlong, and head to the big building with yellow panels. Look at the yellow panels with the hippo signs for a couple moments and the achievement will unlock.

name: Sid Graffiti
description: Halo 2: Spot the Sid graffiti on the walls of Coagulation in classic multiplayer.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Spot the Sid graffiti on the walls of Coagulation in classic multiplayer.
tutorial: Start a Custom game on Coagulation. Head to the cave near the red base. Near the opening that drops down, look at the left hand side of the wall and you'll see a secret message!

name: E E E
description: Halo 2: View both signs in the level Metropolis.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: View both signs in the level Metropolis.
tutorial: On the mission Metropolis, in the ending area with two Wraiths, drive to the left side. There will be two signs in this back area, one in the middle and one in the furthest left corner. View both of them and you'll get the achievement.

name: Why So Serious
description: Halo 2: View the smiling face in the classic multiplayer map Coagulation.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: View the smiling face in the classic multiplayer map Coagulation.
tutorial: Start a Custom game on Coagulation. Head to the red base. Near the front you'll see 3 rocks in the ground. Look at the middle rock and you'll see a weird face and the achievement will unlock.

name: Why Am I Here?
description: Halo 2: View this hidden message on the classic Beaver Creek map.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: View this hidden message on the classic Beaver Creek map.
tutorial: Start a Custom game on Beaver Creek. Up on the ledge for blue teams Sniper will be two rocks on the cliffs edge. Blow those rocks off, and under them is a secret message.

name: GOOOAAAAALLLL!
description: Halo 2: Shoot the soccer ball in the level Metropolis.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Shoot the football in the level Metropolis.
tutorial: Start the missions Metropolis with the Sputnik and Feather skull on. In the city area before you fight two Wraiths you'll see a giant window that is destroyed at the top. Launch yourself up into that area, and a secret massive soccerball will be hidden up there. Then, shoot it!

name: Needs More Whammy Bar
description: Halo 2: Complete the level Regret with the Prophet Birthday Skull activated.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete the level Regret with the Prophet Birthday Skull activated.
tutorial: Start the mission Regret with the Prophet Birthday skull on. Play normally, and at the end of the mission when you hyjack Regret's throne and punch him, you'll hear some guitar rifts. Neat!

name: Like Peanut Butter and Chocolate
description: Halo 2: Complete a level in co-op on Heroic or Legendary with the Masterblaster Skull active.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete a level in co-op on Heroic or Legendary with the Masterblaster Skull active.
tutorial: Start any mission in co-op with the Masterblaster skull and on Heroic difficulty, and complete it. Outskirts is likely the easiest level to quickly complete.

name: Starved For Shields
description: Halo 2: Complete a level with only the Streaking Skull active on Heroic or Legendary.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete a level with only the Streaking Skull active on Heroic or Legendary.
tutorial: Start the mission The Heretic with the Streaking skull on Heroic. This mission is only a cutscene, but once it is done it will still give you the achievement!

name: Commuter
description: Halo 2: Complete Metropolis without entering a vehicle on Heroic or Legendary.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete Metropolis without entering a vehicle on Heroic or Legendary.
tutorial: Play through the mission Metropolis without using a vehicle on Heroic or Legendary. You can use the Scarab Gun skull to make it easier. Just lots of walking!

name: He Never Gets Me Anything
description: Halo 2: Complete Delta Halo without entering a vehicle on Heroic or Legendary.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete Delta Halo without entering a vehicle on Heroic or Legendary.
tutorial: Play through the mission Delta Halo without using a vehicle on Heroic or Legendary. You can use the Scarab Gun skull, and speedrun techniques to make it easier. Just lots of walking!

name: Scarab Lord
description: Halo 2: Acquire the Scarab Gun.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Acquire the Scarab Gun.
tutorial: On the mission Metropolis lies a hidden an useable Scarab Gun easter egg. Follow Halo Completionist exact technique, as it is the easiest method to get to the gun out there.

name: Silent but Deadly
description: Halo 2: Kill 7 opponents from behind in a row without being spotted.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Kill 7 opponents from behind in a row without being spotted.
tutorial: This can be on in any mission, but the easiest section is on the mission Gravemind, when you land down from the lift to save the locked marines. Do not shot, and just assassinate every enemy you can.

name: Demon
description: Halo 2: Complete any campaign level without dying on Normal or harder.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete any campaign level without dying on Normal or harder.
tutorial: This can be done on any mission, but the mission Uprising is the easiest as you can speedrun it within 2 minutes.

name: Go Ape Shiv
description: Halo 2: Kill an enraged, berserk Brute using melee.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Kill an enraged, berserk Brute using melee.
tutorial: This can be done on any mission, but the mission Uprising is the easiest as the Brutes always immediatly go berserk at the very start. Just punch one to death!

name: Grand Theft Halo
description: Halo 2A MP: In one match, steal a total of 5 occupied vehicles from opponents.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: In one match, steal a total of 5 occupied vehicles from opponents.
tutorial: Hyjack 5 enemies in one match. Or load up a Custom game with a friend and hyjack them from a vehicle 5 times.

name: Tour of Duty
description: Halo 2A MP: Complete a game in every one of the 6 updated Anniversary MP maps.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Complete a game in every one of the 6 updated Anniversary MP maps.
tutorial: Load up and start a Custom game on all Halo 2 Anniversary multiplayer maps. Relic and the Forge canvas maps do not count.

name: Double Down
description: Halo 2A MP: In Anniversary multiplayer, receive 2 or more Double Kill medals.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: In Anniversary multiplayer, receive 2 or more Double Kill medals.
tutorial: Get two Double kills in Halo 2 Annivesary multiplayer. Can be done in Matchmaking or in a Custom game with friends.

name: Warden
description: Halo 2 MP: In Classic or Anniversary matchmaking, stop the killing spree of another player.
lockedDescription: Halo 2 MP: In Classic or Anniversary matchmaking, stop the killing spree of another player.
tutorial: Kill a player who currently is on a Killing Spre (5 kills without dying). Can only be done in Matchmaking, just play normally and you'll eventually get it.

name: Blown Out of the Sky
description: Halo 2A MP: Blow up the Banshee or Hornet in flight while piloted, with the Rocket Launcher.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Blow up the Banshee or Hornet in flight while piloted, with the Rocket Launcher.
tutorial: This can be done in Matchmaking or Custom games. Simply use a Rocket Launcher to lock onto and blow up a flying enemy vehicle.

name: Decorated Warrior
description: Halo 2A MP: Get awarded at least 10 different medals in one multiplayer game.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Get awarded at least 10 different medals in one multiplayer game.
tutorial: In Matchmaking or Custom games, get 10 different medals. First-strike/Multi-kills/sprees can easily get you 10 unique medals.

name: Ninja Redux
description: Halo 2A MP: Kill 5 people with melee from behind in Anniversary matchmaking.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Kill 5 people with melee from behind in Anniversary matchmaking.
tutorial: This must be done in Matchmaking, but doesn't need to all be in one match. You just need to get a total of 5 melee from behind kills. Play patiently and hide and you'll easily get this.

name: Flaming Ninja Anniversary
description: Halo 2A MP: Kill an opponent that has the Ninja Redux achievement in Anniversary matchmaking.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Kill an opponent that has the Ninja Redux achievement in Anniversary matchmaking.
tutorial: You need to kill someone who has this achievement. This achievement spreads faster then COVID-19, so just play Halo 2: Anniversary multiplayer in Matchmaking and you'll get it in a game or two.

name: Legend Slayer
description: Halo 2A MP: Kill an opponent that has the Legendary Anniversary achievement.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Kill an opponent that has the Legendary Anniversary achievement.
tutorial: You need to kill someone who has this achievement. This achievement spreads faster then COVID-19, so just play Halo 2: Anniversary multiplayer in Matchmaking and you'll get it in a game or two.

name: Back At It
description: Halo 2: Play a game of Halo 2 Anniversary on the 9th of any month.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Play a game of Halo 2 Anniversary on the 9th of any month.
tutorial: Simply play any map or mission in Halo 2 on the 9th of any month. This is because Halo 2 launched on November 8th, 2004.

name: Back for More
description: Halo 2: Complete the LASO campaign playlist.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete the LASO campaign playlist.
tutorial: This one is very challenging, but do-able if you know all the techniques and tricks in Halo 2's campaign. Watch Halo Completionist's great walkthrough of Halo 2 on LASO. If you play in co-op, you can use checkpoints. Good luck!

name: Monopolized
description: Halo 2: Complete all Halo 2 Legendary campaign missions in under 3 hours.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete all Halo 2 Legendary campaign missions in under 3 hours.

After you kill 343 Guilty Spark and you exit the control room, 4 Ghost will be hidden under the ramp that leads up to the final floor. Have everyone snag a Ghost, and then race to the Dawn. Make sure everyone is in a Ghost when you floor into into the hangar.

name: Heading to his Destiny

lockedDescription: Halo 3: Destined for greatness.
tutorial: Start the mission Halo, and head to the same cave as the Terminal. From there, grenade launch yourself to the middle pillar that stands in the hallway with no floor. Then, crouch jump slightly into the dark hallway area, and brace yourself as you'll see Bungie President naked in his gym shorts.

name: Sounds Familiar

lockedDescription: Halo 3: This stuff is your history!
tutorial: Start a custom game on Highground, and head to back area of Red teams spawn, to the room that has a partially destroyed wall. Inside is a computer on table, and a radio underneath. After around 5 - 8 minutes the radio will play the song 'A Night in the Woods' from Halo:CE. The radio also beeps occasionly the message 'Don't make us kick your ass' in morse code.

name: The Legend of 117
description: Halo 4: Complete every level of the game on Legendary difficulty.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Complete every level of the game on Legendary difficulty.
tutorial: Complete every mission in Halo 4 on Legendary difficulty.

name: Lone Wolf Legend
description: Halo 4: Complete every level of the game on Legendary difficulty, by yourself.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Complete every level of the game on Legendary difficulty, by yourself.
tutorial: Complete every mission in Halo 4 on Kegendary by yourself. You can do it!

name: This is my Rifle, This is my Gun
description: Halo 4: Carry a UNSC weapon all the way through Forerunner on Heroic or Legendary.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Carry a UNSC weapon all the way through Forerunner on Heroic or Legendary.
tutorial: Play through the mission Forerunner on Heroic and keep on you at all times either your Magnum or Assault Rifle. You can use any other weapons you can find, just keep a UNSC weapon as a secondary.

name: Bros to the Close
description: Halo 4: Complete Infinity without one preventable Marine death on Heroic or Legendary.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Complete Infinity without one preventable Marine death on Heroic or Legendary.
tutorial: This achievement is easier in co-op but can be done solo. Give all the marines you see precision weapon or Rail gun. Tnen, simply try your best to keep all 6 marines alive. If any of them die, just revert the checkpoint. The achievement will unlock once the door to the next area opens.

name: Explore the Floor
description: Halo 4: Trick or force a Hunter to fall to its demise on Shutdown on Heroic or Legendary.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Trick or force a Hunter to fall to its demise on Shutdown on Heroic or Legendary.
tutorial: At the last Rally Point on Shutdown, two Hunters will come down the gravity lift. You will need to bait one into lunging at you, and having them lunge off the edge.

name: Give Him the Stick
description: Halo 4: Take out both Hunters using only the Sticky Detonator on Composer.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Take out both Hunters using only the Sticky Detonator on Composer.
tutorial: Pick up the Sticky Detonator at the start of the mission, and bring it with you until you reach the science room with Two Hunters. Then kill both Hunters using only the Sticky Detonator. There is extra ammo in an ammo crate in the same room near the back door.

name: Chief, Smash!
description: Halo 4: Kill 3 Crawlers in one hit with the Gravity Hammer on Midnight.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Kill 3 Crawlers in one hit with the Gravity Hammer on Midnight.
tutorial: On Midnight halfway through the mission you'll teleport to a room with a handful of weapons. Pick up the Gravity hammer, and continue through the teleporter. In the next section will be dozens of Crawlers, and just start swinging at then. Revert the checkpoint if you don't get it and try again.

name: You're No Chips
description: Halo 4: What do Marines know about sticks?
lockedDescription: Halo 4: What do Marines know about sticks?
tutorial: On the mission Composer at Rally Point Bravo, run to the left area until you see a marine standing next to a Mantis. Stand next to them and listen to their interaction, and the achievement will unlock.

name: A Long Time Ago
description: Halo 4: Play a game of Halo 4 on the 6th of any month.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Play a game of Halo 4 on the 6th of any month.
tutorial: Load into any mission or map in Halo 4 on the 6th of any month to unlock this achievement. This is in reference to Halo 4's launch date of November 6th, 2012.

name: You're Joking
description: Halo 4: Complete all Halo 4 Legendary campaign missions in under 3 hours.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Complete all Halo 4 Legendary campaign missions in under 3 hours.
tutorial: Beat every mission in Halo 4 with a combined time of under 3 hours. This achievement only takes into account your best mission times, not in one continous playthrough. Watch Naked Eli's great Halo 4 speedrunning guides to unlock this achievement much easier.

name: He's Running a Marathon...
description: Halo 2: Spot the developer in the opening cutscene of Gravemind on Legendary in Classic Mode.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Spot the developer in the opening cutscene of Gravemind on Legendary in Classic Mode.
tutorial: Watch the entire cutscene of Gravemind in classic mode on Legendary. If you have keen eye, you will see Bungie president Jason Jones in his gym shorts for a brief moment.

name: Destination Vacation
description: Halo 2: View one of the seasonal signs on Zanzibar in classic multiplayer.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: View one of the seasonal signs on Zanzibar in classic multiplayer.
tutorial: Start a custom game on the map Zanzibar on any major holiday, and head to the beach (example: set your systems date to December 25th). At the beach will be a sign, and on holiday's it will have a different texture.

name: Tighten Up The Graphics
description: Halo 2: Complete every level of Halo 2 having seen it in both classic and remastered mode.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Complete every level of Halo 2 having seen it in both classic and remastered mode.
tutorial: Play every mission having toggled it from classic mode to anniversary mode (Tab button on PC, back button on Xbox)

name: Mind the Gap
description: Halo 3: 4 vehicles, 1 gap on Legendary using Cowbell, Catch, Thunderstorm, Mythic, and Tough Luck.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: 4 vehicles, 1 gap on Legendary using Cowbell, Catch, Thunderstorm, Mythic and Tough Luck.
tutorial: On Tsavo Highway (On Legendary difficulty, with Cowbell, Catch, Thunderstorm, Mythic, and Tough Luck skulls on), you need to get four different vehicles over the gap in the broken highway. This achievement is much easier with the Acrophobia skull.

name: Back In The Day
description: Halo CE: Play a CTF custom game on Blood Gulch with 4 players on the same console. Tri-tip optional.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Play a CTF custom game on Blood Gulch with 4 players. Tri-tip optional.
tutorial: On Steam, just load up a CTF match with 4 players on Blood Gulch. On Xbox, you will need 4 controllers (yeah....) and to load up a 4 player splitscreen game of CTF on Blood Gulch.

name: Pacifist
description: Halo CE: Finish The Silent Cartographer without shooting, grenades, melee, dying or restarting.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Finish The Silent Cartographer without shooting, grenades, melee, dying or restarting.
tutorial: This achievement is much easier in co-op if you just have a friend run through the mission while you do nothing and don't die. Otherwise, you can do this solo on Easy difficulty if you are very careful and just run through everything.

name: Wraith Hunter
description: Halo CE: Destroy four Wraith tanks in Assault on the Control Room with the Scorpion tank.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Destroy four Wraith tanks in Assault on the Control Room with the Scorpion tank.
tutorial: When you first come into the large snowy area,  run to the Warthog and then drive ahead and skip the first Wraith so you can get into the Scorpion in the next section. Then drive back, and destroy the first Wraith, and destroy the other 3 Wraiths you encounter later on.

name: Close Quarters Combat
description: Halo CE: Complete The Truth and Reconciliation with at least four rounds left in your Sniper Rifle.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Complete The Truth and Reconciliation with at least four rounds left in your Sniper Rifle.
tutorial: Finish the mission with atleast 4 rounds in your Sniper. Recommended to play on Easy, with the Bandana skull.

name: This Side Up
description: Halo CE: Complete the Warthog ride of The Maw without being forcibly ejected from your vehicle.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Complete the Warthog ride of The Maw without being forcibly ejected from your vehicle.
tutorial: Complete the entire Warthog run without flipping and getting kicked out. If you do flip and get kicked out, just revert checkpoint immediatly and try again.

name: Mortardom
description: Halo 4: On Reclaimer, use a Wraith to kill at least four enemy Wraiths on Heroic or Legendary.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: On Reclaimer, use a Wraith to kill at least four enemy Wraiths on Heroic or Legendary.
tutorial: Hyjack the first Wraith you come across near the crashed pelican. Then, bring it with you to the next areas and destroy any Wraiths you see with it.

name: All According to Plan...
description: Halo CE: Kill the first group of enemies on The Truth and Reconciliation without being detected.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Kill the first group of enemies on The Truth and Reconciliation without being detected.
tutorial: Complete the first encounter without being detected by staying as far back as possible, and getting headshots with every sniper shot.

name: Beachhead
description: Halo CE: Storm The Silent Cartographer beach with no Marine casualties on Heroic or Legendary.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Storm The Silent Cartographer beach with no Marine casualties on Heroic or Legendary.
tutorial: Complete the first encounter of enemies as you exit the Pelicans without any Marine deaths on Heroic or Legendary. You will have to be fast and kill every enemy before they kill any marines. The achievement will unlock when Foehammer comes and gives a Warthog.

name: The Return of Megg
description: Halo 2: She's not picking up.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: She's not picking up.
tutorial: You need to get to the end of Cairo Station on Legendary without taking a single hit of damage. At the end in the room with the bomb you will hear an announcement about Megg. Watch Maka91's guide for the best strategy.

name: No-Fly Zone
description: Halo CE: Destroy three of the four Banshees on Halo during a single play-through.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Destroy three of the four Banshees on Halo during a single play-through.
tutorial: At the very start destroy the two Banshee's that fly above you as you head of the hill, using your Magnum. At the end of the mission in the small canyon you will encounter two more Banshee's, and destroy one of them for the achievement.

name: Bro Hammer
description: Complete any co-op level on Legendary difficulty.
lockedDescription: Complete any co-op level on Legendary difficulty.
tutorial: Grab a friend and play through any mission together on Legendary difficulty.

name: Digging up the Past
description: Halo 4: Access the Master Chief's records on Dawn.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Access the Master Chief's records on Dawn.
tutorial: At the very start of Dawn in the first hallway you walk through, take the stairs down to the left and at the bottom will be a computer that talks about the backstory of the Master Chief.

name: Missing Link
description: Halo 3: Watching. Waiting. Plotting.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Watching. Waiting. Plotting.
tutorial: on Sierra 117 at the section where Banshees fly fast and low, near the far end of the river in the tree's sits a lone monkey. Zoom in on it and you'll get an achievement.

name: Eminent Domain
description: Halo 2A MP: In Territories, control any 3 Territories simultaneously for 30 seconds.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: In Territories, control any 3 Territories simultaneously for 30 seconds.
tutorial: Start up a Custom game of Territories in Halo 2 Anniversary Multiplayer, and control 3 Territories for 30 seconds.

name: Game Master
description: Created and saved 5 Custom Game types.
lockedDescription: Created and saved 5 Custom Game types.
tutorial: Save 5 gametypes in the Custom Game lobby.

name: Gate Your Thirst!
description: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST soda can on Stonetown.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST fizzy drink can on Stonetown.
tutorial: Inside the main base ontop of a platform are two boxes with a blue tarp. Wedged between the boxex is the Blast soda can, shoot it and you'll get the achievement.

name: High Altitude Thirst!
description: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST soda can on Zenith.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST fizzy drink can on Zenith.
tutorial: On Zenith, pick up a Sniper Rifle. Go to the edge of the cliff near the large sniper tower, and the Blast soda can is hidden at the bottom of the pillar in the middle section.

name: Invaders Repelled
description: Halo 2A MP: In King of the Hill, kill 5 opponents within your controlled hill.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: In King of the Hill, kill 5 opponents within your controlled hill.
tutorial: Start up a Custom game King of The Hill match with a friend, and kill 5 opponents while in a controlled hill.

name: Master Forger
description: Created and saved 5 Custom Maps in Forge.
lockedDescription: Created and saved 5 Custom Maps in Forge.
tutorial: Start up Forge game on any map, and from the pause menu save the map five times.

name: Power Play
description: Halo 2A MP: On Warlord, get 5 active camouflage power ups in a single game.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: On Warlord, get 5 active camouflage power ups in a single game.
tutorial: Start a Custom game on Warlord, then pick up the center active camouflage 5 times and you'll get the achievement.

name: Put Up Your Dukes
description: Halo 2A MP: Get 25 melee kills in multiplayer.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Get 25 melee kills in multiplayer.
tutorial: Get 25 melee kills in Halo 2 Anniversary multiplayer (matchmaking or custom games)

name: Red vs. Blue
description: Halo 2A MP: Win 10 matches on Bloodline in multiplayer.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Win 10 matches on Bloodline in multiplayer.
tutorial: Win 10 matches on Bloodline in Halo 2 Anniversary.

name: Rule Your Thirst!
description: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST soda can on Warlord.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST fizzy drink can on Warlord.
tutorial: On Warlord, go to the yellow side of the map, on the upper floor. The Blast soda can will be hidden in the corner behind some rocks.

name: Shields Up!
description: Halo 2A MP: On Zenith, personally activate the center energy shield 3 times in one matchmade game.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: On Zenith, personally activate the centre energy shield 3 times in one matchmade game.
tutorial: Zenith has a shield that can be activated from three different buttons on the map, every 60 seconds. In a Matchmade game, activate it three times to get the achievement.

name: Shook the Hornet's Nest
description: Halo 2A MP: Get 30 kills with the Hornet in multiplayer.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Get 30 kills with the Hornet in multiplayer.
tutorial: Start a custom game with a friend and hop into a Hornet. Kill your opponent 30 times and the achievement will unlock.

name: Skeet Shooter
description: Halo 2A MP: Killed 15 opponents that were airborne from a Man Cannon.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Killed 15 opponents that were airborne from a Man Cannon.
tutorial: Start a custom game on Bloodline with a friend, and then kill them 15 times as they are airborne from the base's Man cannon.

name: Stayin' Alive
description: Halo 2A MP: In Juggernaut, survive as the Juggernaut for 30 seconds.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: In Juggernaut, survive as the Juggernaut for 30 seconds.
tutorial: Start up a Juggernaut Custom game by yourself, and try to stay alive for 30 seconds.

name: The Goose is Loose
description: Halo 2A MP: Get 25 kills with the Gungoose in multiplayer.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Get 25 kills with the Gungoose in multiplayer.
tutorial: Start a Custom game with a friend on a map that has a Gungoose (like Bloodline), and kill them 25 times with it. If you get a kill with the gungoose will airborne you'll get another achievement as well.

name: Thirst Locked Down!
description: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST soda can on Lockdown.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST fizzy drink can on Lockdown.
tutorial: On Lockdown, grab the Sniper rifle and go to the entrance of the blue lift. The Blast soda can is wedged very high up in the ice mountain. Shoot it and you'll get the achievement.

name: Top Gungoose
description: Halo 2A MP: Get a kill with the Gungoose while airborne.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Get a kill with the Gungoose while airborne.
tutorial: Start a Custom game with a friend on a map that has a Gungoose (like Bloodline), and get in. Have your friend pick up a Rocket launcher. Shoot your friend with the gungoose, and then get some air. As you are soaring, have your friend kill himself and youll get the achievement.

name: BLASTacular!
description: Halo 2A MP: Destroyed all the Halo 2 Anniversary Multiplayer BLAST soda cans.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Destroyed all the Halo 2 Anniversary Multiplayer BLAST fizzy drink cans.
tutorial: Destroy all 6 of Blast soda cans on the original Halo 2 Anniversary maps (Remnant not required). Watch Maka91's great guide to see all locations of the soda cans.

name: Bloody Thirsty!
description: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST soda can on Bloodline.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST fizzy drink can on Bloodline.
tutorial: On Bloodline, go to the blue base and pick up the Sniper. The Blast soda can is very far outside the map, in between the canyon to the left of the blue base.

name: Bombing Run
description: Halo 2A MP: In Assault, take, plant, and score from the bomb spawn without dying or dropping it.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: In Assault, take, plant and score from the bomb spawn without dying or dropping it.
tutorial: Start a Custom game of Assault and take, plant, and score the bomb without dying or dropping it. Easy as that!

name: Cold as Ice
description: Halo 2A MP: On Lockdown, kill an opponent with the hanging ice.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: On Lockdown, kill an opponent with the hanging ice.
tutorial: Start a Custom game on Lockdown with a friend, and have them stand beneath one of the three hanging stalactites. Shoot at the stalactite and it will kill your friend.

name: Cold Fusion
description: Halo 2A MP: Kill an opponent by detonating a Fusion Coil.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Kill an opponent by detonating a Fusion Coil.
tutorial: Start a Custom game on Lockdown with a friend. have them stand near a Fusion Coil, and then shoot the Coil. It will kill your friend and give you the achievement.

name: Counter-Sniped
description: Halo 2A MP: With a Sniper Rifle or Beam Rifle kill an enemy that was zoomed in.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: With a Sniper Rifle or Beam Rifle, kill an enemy that was zoomed in.
tutorial: Start a Custom game with a friend on any Halo 2A map with a Sniper Rifle. Then, snipe them while they are zoomed in and you'll get the achievement.

name: Triple Threat
description: Halo 2A MP: In Ricochet, pass once, score once, and kill at least one enemy in the same match.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: In Ricochet, pass once, score once and kill at least one enemy in the same match.
tutorial: Start a Custom game of Ricochet with atleast 3 people. Pass the ball to a teammate, score a point, and kill an enemy to get the achievement.

name: Wetwork
description: Halo 2A MP: On Shrine in CTF, activate the enemy base waterfall and, before it stops, grab the flag.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: On Shrine in CTF, activate the enemy base waterfall and, before it stops, grab the flag.
tutorial: Start a Custom game of CTF on Shrine in Halo 2 Anniversary Multiplayer with atleast one other person. Go to the enemy base and shoot the orange glowing object to activate the waterfall, then pick up the flag.

name: Worship Your Thirst!
description: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST soda can on Shrine.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Found and destroyed the BLAST fizzy drink can on Shrine.
tutorial: On Shrine, pick up a Sniper rifle. Head to the left of the blue base and the Blast soda can is on top of the shrine incredibly far outside the level. Watch the guide for exact location.

name: Zealot
description: Halo 2A MP: In Anniversary matchmaking, win 10 games as an Elite.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: In Anniversary matchmaking, win 10 games as an Elite.
tutorial: Set your preferred species as an Elite in custimization lobby, then win 10 matches of Halo 2: Anniversary multiplayer.

name: Dirty Bird
description: Halo 2: Fly the Heretic Banshee.
lockedDescription: Halo 2: Fly the Heretic Banshee.
tutorial: Play the mission normally, and just fly the Heretic Banshee that you are forced to use. I don't know how you could possibly not have this achievement if you've beaten Halo 2...

name: A Preference for Pain
description: Halo 3: Complete the Halo 3 LASO Campaign playlist.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Complete the Halo 3 LASO Campaign playlist.
tutorial: Complete the Halo 3 LASO playlist. You should definitely do this one in co-op as you get checkpoints, and you should learn all the speedrunning techniques of Halo 3 to make the experience much more easy. If you do do it in co-op, be sure to do the mission Arrival solo beforehand!

name: Aficiando
description: Halo 3: Complete three Halo 3 playlists.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Complete three Halo 3 playlists.
tutorial: Complete any three Halo 3 playlists in from the playlists lobby.

name: Naked Tyrant
description: Halo 4: Complete the Halo 4 LASO Campaign playlist.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Complete the Halo 4 LASO Campaign playlist.
tutorial: Complete the Halo 4 LASO playlists. This is definitely the easiest game to do LASO on, but be sure to know all the speedrunning tricks in order to make your experience smoother. Also recommended to do this in co-op, as you'll get checkpoints.

name: Devotee
description: Halo 4: Complete three Halo 4 playlists.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Complete three Halo 4 playlists.
tutorial: Complete any three Halo 4 playlists from the playlists lobby.

name: Throne of Bones
description: Find and claim all the campaign skulls in Halo:CE, Halo 2, and Halo 3.
lockedDescription: Find and claim all the campaign skulls in Halo:CE, Halo 2 and Halo 3.
tutorial: Collect every skull from Halo CE, Halo 2, and Halo 3. Each skull has its own achievement, so find only the ones you don't currently have. Watch Halo Completionist's full guide to see every location.

name: Boot Camp Hero
description: Halo 3: Complete a Halo 3 playlist.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Complete a Halo 3 playlist.
tutorial: Complete any Halo 3 playlists in from the playlists lobby.

description: Collect 2,000 campaign or playlist medals.
lockedDescription: Collect 2,000 campaign or playlist medals.
tutorial: Collect a cummulative total of 2,000 medals in campaign.

lockedDescription: Collect 3,000 campaign or playlist medals.
tutorial: Collect a cummulative total of 3,000 medals in campaign.

lockedDescription: Collect 4,000 campaign or playlist medals.
tutorial: Collect a cummulative total of 4,000 medals in campaign.

lockedDescription: Collect 5,000 campaign or playlist medals.

description: Halo 4: Complete a Halo 4 playlist.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Complete a Halo 4 playlist.
tutorial: Complete any Halo 4 playlist from the playlists lobby.

description: Collect 6,000 campaign or playlist medals.
lockedDescription: Collect 6,000 campaign or playlist medals.
tutorial: Collect a cummulative total of 6,000 medals in campaign.

tutorial: Collect a cummulative total of 7,000 medals in campaign.

lockedDescription: Collect 8,000 campaign or playlist medals.
tutorial: Collect a cummulative total of 8,000 medals in campaign. Keep playing on Easy with scoring on and you'll get it eventually!

tutorial: Win 50 matches of any matchmaking multiplayer.

lockedDescription: Collect 1,000 campaign or playlist medals.

lockedDescription: Kill 5,000 enemies or players.
tutorial: Kill a cummulative total of 5000 enemies in campaign or multiplayer. You will get this one quickly if you just play campaign.

description: Kill 1000 Grunts.
lockedDescription: Kill 1000 Grunts.
tutorial: Get a cummulative total of 1000 Grunt kills. Easy to get just by playing, but if you need to farm, just play Halo:Reach custom Firefight with all the enemies set to grunts.

name: Were It So Easy
description: Kill 1000 Elites.
lockedDescription: Kill 1000 Elites.
tutorial: Get a cummulative total of 1000 Elite kills. Easy to get just by playing, but if you need to farm, just play Halo:Reach custom Firefight with all the enemies set to Elites, with insta-kill settings on. Imagine the above video but with Elites.

name: Scavenger Hunt
description: Kill 1000 Jackals.
lockedDescription: Kill 1000 Jackals.
tutorial: Get a cummulative total of 1000 Jackal kills. Easy to get just by playing, but if you need to farm, just play Halo:Reach custom Firefight with all the enemies set to Jackals, with insta-kill settings on. Imagine the above video but with Jackals.

name: Dankey Kang
description: Kill 1000 Brutes.
lockedDescription: Kill 1000 Brutes.
tutorial: Get a cummulative total of 1000 Brute kills. Easy to get just by playing, but if you need to farm, just play Halo:Reach custom Firefight with all the enemies set to Brutes, with insta-kill settings on. Imagine the above video but with Brutes.

name: Wyrmslayer
description: Kill 250 Hunters.
lockedDescription: Kill 250 Hunters.
tutorial: Get a cummulative total of 250 Hunter kills. You'll likely want to farm this one, start a Halo:Reach custom Firefight with all the enemies set to Hunters, with insta-kill settings on. Imagine the above video but with Hunters. Easy 250 in no time at all!

name: Remove the Bishops From the Board
description: Kill 1000 Watchers.
lockedDescription: Kill 1000 Watchers.
tutorial: Get a cummulative total of 1000 Watcher kills. Can farm Watcher kills on the mission Shutdown at the Rally Point Bravo checkpoint.

name: Knightbane
description: Kill 1000 Knights.
lockedDescription: Kill 1000 Knights.
tutorial: Get a cummulative total of 1000 Knight kills. You can farm Knight kills on the mission Midnight at the Rally Point Charlie checkpoint.

name: Dogcatcher
description: Kill 1000 Crawlers.
lockedDescription: Kill 1000 Crawlers.
tutorial: Get a cummulative total of 1000 Crawler kills. You can farm Crawler kills on the mission Midnight near the Rally Point Charlie checkpoint.

name: Skulltaker Halo 3: Blind
description: Halo 3: Find and claim the Blind Skull on Normal or harder.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Find and claim the Blind Skull on Normal or harder.
tutorial: On Sierra 117 at the first enemy encounter, the Blind skull is by the lake sitting on a rock on the right side.

name: Skulltaker Halo 3: Grunt Birthday Party
description: Halo 3: Find and claim the Grunt Birthday Party Skull on Normal or harder.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Find and claim the Grunt Birthday Party Skull on Normal or harder.
tutorial: On Crows Nest, when you drop down into a vent filled with Buggers flying around, the Grunt Birthday Party Skull is at the end of this tunnel, and you need to carefully fall under the platform in order to get to it.

name: Skulltaker Halo 3: Cowbell
description: Halo 3: Find and claim the Cowbell Skull on Normal or harder.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Find and claim the Cowbell Skull on Normal or harder.
tutorial: Near the end of the mission The Ark, you will need a gravity lift. In one of the stairwells, throw the gravity lift and the Cowbell skull is sitting in the 3rd nook attached to the cieling. Watch guide for exact location.

name: Skulltaker Halo 3: IWHBYD
description: Halo 3: Find and claim the IWHBYD Skull on Normal or harder.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Find and claim the IWHBYD Skull on Normal or harder.
tutorial: At the very end of the mission The Covenant, after you kill Truth, you will need to jump through the holographic Halo rings in a specific order for the IWHBYD Skull to spawn. Watch the video for exact order.

lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: Finished as the top player on the winning team in a matchmade game.

description: Halo 4: Why are you even here?
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Why are you even here?
tutorial: In Episode 1, Chapter 5 in Spartan Ops, you need to shoot a hidden radio that activates a dialoug easter egg. It is near the lava on the first structured area you come across.

name: No One Left Behind
description: Halo 4: Save at least one Marine on Hacksaw (Ep.2 Ch.3) of Spartan Ops on Heroic or Legendary.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Save at least one Marine on Hacksaw (Ep.2 Ch.3) of Spartan Ops on Heroic or Legendary.
tutorial: On Episode 2 Chapter 3 in Spartan Ops, make sure you save atleast one marine on Heroic.
