description: Halo 4: Assassinate a Knight in any Spartan Ops mission.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Assassinate a Knight in any Spartan Ops mission.
tutorial: Assassinate a Knight on any Spartan Ops mission. Episode 1 Chapter 4 is likely the easiest, as you encounter a single Knight that you can run up too and assassinate.

name: What Power Outage?
description: Halo 4: Complete The Cauldron Base of Spartan Ops without losing a generator on Heroic or Legendary.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Complete The Cauldron Base of Spartan Ops without losing a generator on Heroic or Legendary.
tutorial: On Episode 5, Chapter 4 in Spartan Ops on Heroic difficulty, use the Mantis to proect all the generators and don't let any of them get destroyed. Activate the defense turrets for additional assistance.

name: No Easy Way Out
description: Halo 4: Survive Spartan Miller (Ep.5 Ch.1) of Spartan Ops on Heroic or Legendary.
lockedDescription: Halo 4: Survive Spartan Miller (Ep.5 Ch.1) of Spartan Ops on Heroic or Legendary.
tutorial: On Episode 5, Chapter 1 of Spartan Ops, finish the entire encounter without any of the sensors getting destroyed.

name: Nice Work Dawg!
description: Earn a total of 2,500 Assist medals in multiplayer.
lockedDescription: Earn a total of 2,500 Assist medals in multiplayer.
tutorial: Either play normally and you will eventually get this one, or if you want to farm the achievement follow the guide in the video.

name: Aim for the Head
description: Earn a total of 2,500 Headshot medals in multiplayer.
lockedDescription: Earn a total of 2,500 Headshot medals in multiplayer.
tutorial: Best way to get this one is to play SWAT in matchmaking, as every kill you get will be with a headshot.

name: Dim Mak
description: Earn a total of 250 Beat Down medals in multiplayer.
lockedDescription: Earn a total of 250 Beat Down medals in multiplayer.
tutorial: If you want to farm this achievement, just start a Forge match with a friend and repeatedly beat them down.

name: Domination
description: Earn a total of 100 Legendary medals in matchmade games.
lockedDescription: Earn a total of 100 Legendary medals in matchmade games.
tutorial: One of the harder and longer achievements with no way to farm. You need to get 100 Legendary medals in matchmaking. Legendary medals are the ones circled in red. Steaktaculars are the easiest, which is winning a game with over a 20 kill lead. Halo 4 Infinity Slayer is 60 kills to win, making it your best chance to win by over 20 kills. Good luck!

name: Double Trouble
description: Earn a total of 250 Double Kill medals in matchmade games.
lockedDescription: Earn a total of 250 Double Kill medals in matchmade games.
tutorial: Earn 250 double kills in matchmaking. Easiest way to get multikills is by playing SWAT.

name: Spree Master
description: Earn a total of 100 Killing Spree medals in matchmade games.
lockedDescription: Earn a total of 100 Killing Spree medals in matchmade games.
tutorial: Earn 100 killing sprees (5 kills without dying) in matchmaking. Easiest way to get this is by playing SWAT. Or just being good 😉

name: Catch This
description: Earn a total of 500 Grenade Kill or Plasma Kill medals in matchmade games.
lockedDescription: Earn a total of 500 Grenade Kill or Plasma Kill medals in matchmade games.
tutorial: Get 500 kills with grenades in matchmaking. When in doubt, throw a grenade!

name: Party Pooper
description: Earn a total of 250 Killjoy medals in matchmade games.
lockedDescription: Earn a total of 250 Killjoy medals in matchmade games.
tutorial: Get 250 killjoy medals (killing someone who is on a killing spree). I recommend playing BTB for this one, specially in Halo 4.

name: Planting A Flag
description: Earn a total of 250 CTF Mode Specific medals in matchmade games.
lockedDescription: Earn a total of 250 CTF Mode Specific medals in matchmade games.
tutorial: Get 250 CTF related medals in matchmaking. Halo 4 and Halo 2 Annivesary give the most medals, so stick with those two if you want to speed this achievement up.

name: The True King
description: Earn a total of 250 KOTH Mode Specific medals in matchmade games.
lockedDescription: Earn a total of 250 KOTH Mode Specific medals in matchmade games.
tutorial: Get 250 King of The Hill related medals in matchmaking. In Halo 2 Annivesary you can farm this by waiting 5 seconds in the hill to get the 'Loitering' medal, then quickly leaving/re-entering to reset the countdown and get it again.

name: Roadkill Rampage
description: Halo 2A MP: In Anniversary matchmaking, earn a total of 100 Splatter medals.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: In Anniversary matchmaking, earn a total of 100 Splatter medals.
tutorial: Splatter 100 enemies in Halo 2 Annivesary multiplayer. Vehicles are only in BTB, so play that, hop in a Ghost or Warthog and pretend you're a lawn mower.

name: Rock and Coil Hit Back
description: Halo 2A MP: In Anniversary matchmaking, earn a total of 100 Environmentalist medals.
lockedDescription: Halo 2A MP: In Anniversary matchmaking, earn a total of 100 Environmentalist medals.
tutorial: You need to get 100 Environmentalist medals(Kill with a Fusion Coil, or stalactite'. Lockdown and Stonetown are the only maps you can do this one. Keep at it and when you try, you can get 2 - 3 medals per match.

name: No Pain, No Gain
description: Complete 1 mission with the LASO playlist skulls enabled.
lockedDescription: Complete 1 mission with the LASO playlist skulls enabled.
tutorial: Complete 1 mission in any LASO campaign playlist. Halo 4 has the easiest LASO of them all.

name: Airborne
description: Halo CE: Launch a Warthog for at least 5 seconds and have it splatter an enemy.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Launch a Warthog for at least 5 seconds and have it splatter an enemy.
tutorial: Start up a custom game on Death Island. You will need to position a Tank on the top of the island, and then drive off of it like a ramp in order to get 5 second of air time. Then, have a second person stand below and assist you so they get splattered.

name: Assembly Skull
description: Halo 3: Find the hidden Skull on the Assembly multiplayer map.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Find the hidden Skull on the Assembly multiplayer map.
tutorial: Start a Forge game on Assembly. The Skull will be hidden on top of one of the tubes that connects to the center structure.

name: Orbital Skull
description: Halo 3: Find the hidden Skull on the Orbital multiplayer map.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Find the hidden Skull on the Orbital multiplayer map.
tutorial: Start a Forge game on Orbital. The skull is hidden at the very top of the map, inbetween the ceiling and a small ledge. Fly up to it and hold the pick up button, and exit Monitor mode and you will pick it up.

name: Sandbox Skull
description: Halo 3: Find the hidden Skull on the Sandbox multiplayer map.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Find the hidden Skull on the Sandbox multiplayer map.
tutorial: Start a Forge game on Sandbox. The skull is hidden out in the beam field. There are multiple methods to getting this skull, such as building a tunnel too it, but the easiest method is seen in the video above.

description: Halo 3: Find the hidden Skull on the Citadel multiplayer map.
lockedDescription: Halo 3: Find the hidden Skull on the Citadel multiplayer map.
tutorial: Start a Forge game on Citadel. The skull is hidden in one of the small rafters in the ceiling.

tutorial: Start a Forge game on Heretic, and the skull is laying on the ledge above Red sides entry way.

description: Halo: Reach: Kill 1000 Skirmishers.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Kill 1000 Skirmishers.
tutorial: Kill a cumulative total of 100 Skirmishers. Start a Custom Firefight match and set all the enemies to Skirmishers to quickly get this achievement.

name: Keep It Clean
description: Halo: Reach: Kill 7 Moa during Winter Contingency.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Kill 7 Moa during Winter Contingency.
tutorial: Kill every Moa you come across. Don't forget the two at the very start of the mission.

name: They've Always Been Faster
description: Halo: Reach: Clear Winter Contingency without setting foot in a drivable vehicle.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Clear Winter Contingency without setting foot in a drivable vehicle.
tutorial: On Normal or higher, play through Winter Contigency without using the civilian truck. The achievement will pop once you get into the escort Falcon.

name: Wake Up Buttercup
description: Halo: Reach: Destroy the Corvette's engines & escort in under 3 minutes during Long Night of Solace
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Destroy the Corvette's engines & escort in under 3 minutes during Long Night of Solace
tutorial: On Heroic or higher, start rally point Bravo and play until you get to the Corvette section. Then as quickly as you can, destroy the engines and kill all the enemies within 3 minutes.

name: Two Corpses In One Grave
description: Halo: Reach: Kill 2 vehicles at once with the Target Locator during ONI: Sword Base.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Kill 2 vehicles at once with the Target Locator during ONI: Sword Base.
tutorial: On Normal or higher, us the Target Locator at the location where both Wraiths will meet, in order to kill both of them at the same time. Just revert the checkpoint if you only manage to get one, and try again.

name: Your Heresy Will Stay Your Feet
description: Halo: Reach: Kill the Elite Zealot before he can escape during Tip of the Spear.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Kill the Elite Zealot before he can escape during Tip of the Spear.
tutorial: On Normal or higher, kill the marked Zealot before he escapes at the mine factory section on the mission Tip of the Spear.

name: I Didn't Train To Be A Pilot
description: Halo: Reach: Kill 3 of the anti-aircraft batteries during New Alexandria.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Kill 3 of the anti-aircraft batteries during New Alexandria.
tutorial: On Normal or higher, blow up 3 anti-aircraft with a Falcon. You will get this achievement if you just play normally, so I don't know why y'all need a guide for this one 🤔

name: Tank Beats Everything
description: Halo: Reach: Finish The Package on Legendary with the Scorpion intact.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Finish The Package on Legendary with the Scorpion intact.
tutorial: On Legendary, don't let your Tank blow up or get destroyed all the way up until the gates of Swordbase. If it does, just revert the checkpoint and try again.

name: Swift and Shallow
description: Halo: Reach: Hijack a Banshee during the Reach Campaign.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Hijack a Banshee during the Reach Campaign.
tutorial: Hijack a Banshee in Halo:Reach's campagin. The missions 'Tip of the Spear', 'New Alexandria', and 'The Package' all have Banshee's that can be hijacked. Use a Plasma Pistol to EMP one then hijack, or soar to the skies with a Jetpack and hijack one.

name: Forza in the Fall
description: Halo: Reach: Flip the switches to become a Reach Racer!
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Flip the switches to become a Reach Racer!
tutorial: With a friend (or 2nd controller), start the mission ONI: Swordbase at rally point Bravo. There are two secret invisible buttons hidden on opposite ends of the island. Activate both at the same exact time, and you will become a Reach Racer.

name: HBOrg Special
description: Halo: Reach: Party with the DJ Brute.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Party with the DJ Brute.
tutorial: Underneath the hospital, activate the club easter egg on New Alexandria and then go into the club and stand next to the DJ Brute.

name: Play Us a Sad Song, Claude
description: Halo: Reach: Listen to a hidden music cue.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Listen to a hidden music cue.
tutorial: Underneath the hospital, activate the club easter egg on New Alexandria and then activate the button ontop of the clubs building to switch the song to Siege of Madrigal. Then, go into the club.

name: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Ship
description: Halo: Reach: Fly both the Pelican and Phantom on New Alexandria.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Fly both the Pelican and Phantom on New Alexandria.
tutorial: With a friend (or 2nd controller) activate the Pelican/Phantom easter egg at the end of the mission. You will need to fly the Falcon into the ring to become a Pelican, and a hijacked Banshee to become a Phantom.

name: Front Page News
description: Halo: Reach: Find me in the club.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find me in the club.
tutorial: Underneath the hospital, activate the club easter egg on New Alexandria and then go into the club.

name: The Humble Beginnings of Wiljax Brantley
description: Halo: Reach: Now that's a value meal.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Now that's a value meal.
tutorial: On Exodus, look at the food kiosk's 'Moa burger' deal and the achievement will unlock.

name: Did You Major in Marine Bio?
description: Halo: Reach: Encounter the hidden marines on Exodus.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Encounter the hidden marines on Exodus.
tutorial: On Exodus at the end of the mission, you'll have to get outside the level and back-track to where you fly by in the Falcon. A group of marines will be chilling there, and the achievement will pop.

name: Fly, You Fools!
description: Halo: Reach: Find the hidden Banshees on The Package.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find the hidden Banshees on The Package.
tutorial: Start the mission The Package with a friend (or 2nd controller). Then, activate the button hidden out of bounds near the water. As soon as you activate it, have the 2nd person activate the 2nd button hidden behind the crate on the walls of the wooden structures. Once done, 4 Banshees will spawn on top of the first building.

name: This is Not the Greatest Lab in the World…
description: Halo: Reach: Find your way into Halsey's Lab on The Package.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find your way into Halsey's Lab on The Package.
tutorial: Get to the very end on the mission The Package. Before you end the mission, head to the back near the Wraith. A secret button is hidden out of bounds that you can jump too and quickly sprint back into the map. Once activated, head to the the doors to Halsey's lab and you'll be teleported to it.

name: Hey, You Dropped This
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad on 1 Winter Contingency
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 1 on Winter Contingency.
tutorial: Data pad 1 is located near the doorway of a building in the large open section of the mission.

name: Read Halsey's Journal
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 2 on ONI: Sword Base
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 2 on ONI: Sword Base
tutorial: Data pad 2 is located inside the Sword Base in the room with the red flooring.

name: Meeting of the (Artificial) Minds
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 3 on Nightfall
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 3 on Nightfall
tutorial: Data pad 3 is located at the very start of Nightfall, in the cave to the right.

name: Rampant Speculation
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 4 on Tip Of The Spear
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 4 on Tip Of The Spear
tutorial: Data pad 4 is located inside the mining factory building you jump into, sitting on a rack.

name: Minority Report
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 5 on Long Night Of Solace
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 5 on Long Night Of Solace
tutorial: Data pad 5 is located in the room where you first see the Sabre, in the area with red lights, next to a dead marine.

name: Info Dump
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 6 on Exodus
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 6 on Exodus
tutorial: Data pad 6 is located when you fight the Brute with a Concussion Gun, ontop of the catwalk near the ceiling. You will need a jetpack to reach it.

name: Paper Trail
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 7 on New Alexandria
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 7 on New Alexandria
tutorial: Data pad 7 is at a building near the large building you end the mission at, sitting next to a door on the very top back side.

name: Terminal Conditions
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 8 on The Package
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 8 on The Package
tutorial: Data pad 8 is inside Swordbase, on the floor right next to the button you activate to start the cutscene.

name: Digital Destinies
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 9 on The Pillar Of Autumn
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 9 on The Pillar Of Autumn
tutorial: Data pad 9 is in the building after the Boneyard section, in the room you have to jump through the window to get into.

name: Unreliable Narrator
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 10 on Winter Contingency on Legendary difficulty
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 10 on Winter Contingency on Legendary difficulty
tutorial: Start Winter Contigency on Legendary. At the very start once you get off the Falcon, an invisible Elite will start running away from the wreckage. Shoot at him with your pistol and kill him before he escapes, and he will drop Data Pad 10.

name: What Does It All Mean?
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 11 on ONI: Sword Base on Legendary difficulty
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 11 on ONI: Sword Base on Legendary difficulty
tutorial: On Legendary, Data pad 11 is on the cliffs with the broken wooden bridge.

name: Unsolved Mysteries
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 12 on Nightfall on Legendary difficulty
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 12 on Nightfall on Legendary difficulty
tutorial: On Legendary, data pad 12 is in the valley past the water factory. It is ontop of the cliffs.

name: Meddling and Madness
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 13 on Tip Of The Spear on Legendary difficulty
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 13 on Tip Of The Spear on Legendary difficulty
tutorial: On Legendary, data pad 13 is located at the 2nd AA gun, next to the Warthog on the destroyed bridge.

name: The Answer is Simple
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 14 on Long Night Of Solace on Legendary Difficulty
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 14 on Long Night Of Solace on Legendary difficulty
tutorial: On Legendary, data pad 14 is near the docked Sabre, ontop of the beam structure. You will have to jump off the lights to reach it.

name: Of Patience and Partiality
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 15 on Exodus on Legendary difficulty
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 15 on Exodus on Legendary difficulty
tutorial: On Legendary, data pad 15 is located in a very weird spot that I can't describe. Just watch the video pls.

name: Curious Composition
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 16 on New Alexandria on Legendary difficulty
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 16 on New Alexandria on Legendary difficulty
tutorial: On Legendary, data pad 16 is near the very start of the mission New Alexandria, at the building  right behind you, sitting on ledge that you will have to fly too.

name: Silent Shepherds
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 17 on The Package on Legendary difficulty
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 17 on The Package on Legendary difficulty
tutorial: On Legendary, data pad 17 is at Halsey's lab, hidden on an ice cliff that you can only get too with a jetpack.

name: Assembled the Majority
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 18 on The Pillar Of Autumn on Legendary difficulty
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 18 on The Pillar Of Autumn on Legendary difficulty
tutorial: Data pad 18 is located mid mission, at the Boneyard area. It is on top of the building, at the very far right side.

name: Yes No You Decide
description: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 19 on Lone Wolf on Legendary difficulty
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find Data Pad 19 on Lone Wolf on Legendary difficulty
tutorial: On Legendary, Data pad 19 is located inside of one of the upper pipes.

name: Canonical Conundrum
description: Halo: Reach: Find all Data Pads.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find all Data Pads.
tutorial: Collect all 19 Data pads in Halo: Reach. Each data pad has its own individual achievement. Watch HaloCompletionist's full guide to get all locations.

name: Why Do This To Yourself?
description: Halo: Reach: Complete the Halo: Reach LASO Campaign playlist.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Complete the Halo: Reach LASO Campaign playlist.
tutorial: Beat the LASO playlist in Halo: Reach. It is recommended to do this in co-op, as it will allow you to have checkpoints. Watch HaloCompletionist's guides for the best tips and strategies.

name: Reach Has Been Good to Me
description: Halo: Reach: Complete a Halo: Reach playlist.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Complete a Halo: Reach playlist.
tutorial: Complete any Halo: Reach playlist from the playlist lobby.

name: Who Needs Red Flag?
description: Halo: Reach: Complete three Halo: Reach playlists.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Complete three Halo: Reach playlists.
tutorial: Complete any three Halo: Reach playlist from the playlist lobby.

name: Remember Reach
description: Halo: Reach: Play a game of Halo: Reach on the 14th of any month.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Play a game of Halo: Reach on the 14th of any month.
tutorial: Start a mission or match of Halo: reach on the 14th of any month. This is in reference to the games launch date, of September 14th, 2010.

name: Keep Your Foot on the Pedrogas
description: Halo: Reach: Complete all Halo: Reach Legendary campaign missions in under 3 hours.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Complete all Halo: Reach Legendary campaign missions in under 3 hours.
tutorial: Complete all missions with a combined time that is under 3 hours. This only takes into account your best completion times for each mission. Watch HaloCompletionist's playlist for a full speed-running commentary for each mission.

name: Enemies Everywhere!
description: Halo: Reach: Complete a Firefight set on Normal or Harder.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Complete a Firefight set on Normal or harder.
tutorial: Complete a full set (3 rounds / 15 waves) of Firefight in Halo: Reach.

name: Negative, Ghostrider
description: Halo: Reach: Get a Skullamanjaro in a matchmade Headhunter game.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Get a Skullamanjaro in a matchmade Headhunter game.
tutorial: Score 10 skulls at once in a matchmade Headhunter game. Headhunter is in team objective, and FFA objective. This achievement is bugged and is randomly awarded as well in Headhunter.

name: Skunked
description: Halo: Reach: Won a matchmade game of Invasion in the 1st phase.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Won a matchmade game of Invasion in the 1st phase.
tutorial: In Halo: Reach Invasion, don't let the enemy team get past the first phase.

name: Clear and Present Danger
description: Halo: Reach: Pad on the run.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Pad on the run.
tutorial: Start Winter Contigency on Legendary. At the very start once you get off the Falcon, an invisible Elite will start running away from the wreckage. Shoot at him with your pistol and kill him before he escapes.

name: Left Behind
description: Halo: Reach: Achieve a score of 30,000 points on Lone Wolf.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Achieve a score of 30,000 points on Lone Wolf.
tutorial: Start Lone Wolf on Easy with all skulls on besides Blind and cowbell. Then, follow the guide in the video to easily get 30,000 points. The achievement will unlock once you 'die' and finish the mission. Do NOT kill yourself but going out of bounds, as that will restart the mission instead.

name: One Final Firefight
description: Halo: Reach: Achieve a score of 150,000 points on Lone Wolf.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Achieve a score of 150,000 points on Lone Wolf.
tutorial: Start Lone Wolf on Easy with all skulls on besides Blind and cowbell. Then, follow the guide in the video to easily get 150,000 points. The achievement will unlock once you 'die' and finish the mission. Do NOT kill yourself but going out of bounds, as that will restart the mission instead.

name: What About Bob?
description: Halo: Reach: Find and eliminate one of the hidden Ranger Commander Elites.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find and eliminate one of the hidden Ranger Commander Elites.
tutorial: Every mission has a secret 'Bob' Elite, that you will only ever notice with a keen eye, as they always run away. Kill one of these Elites to unlock the achievement.

name: Jorge Can't Have All the Big Guns
description: Halo: Reach: Use a Pelican turret.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Use a Pelican turret.
tutorial: At the end of Long Night of Solace, crouch next to the landed pelican and hold the action button next to the turret. You will be able to pilot the gun.

name: I'm Sorry, Dave
description: Halo: Reach: Find the hidden binary signature.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Find the hidden binary signature.
tutorial: Find a weapon that doesn't have a scope, and then zoom in. In the bottom left corner you will see the binary code for the word 'Dave'. This is in reference to David Candland, the UI director for Halo: Reach.

name: Workers' Compensation
description: Halo: Reach: Splatter an enemy using the forklift.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Splatter an enemy using the forklift.
tutorial: Since Forklifts are now in Forge mode on Forgeworld, you just need to load up a match and splatter a friend. Or use the old method and start a Firefight game on Courtyard with a Gravity Hammer, and swing the hammer into the Forklift and try to splatter and enemy.

name: Capacious Cartography
description: Halo: Reach: Create a custom map using Forge World.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Create a custom map using Forge World.
tutorial: Start a Forge game on Forgeworld and build a big, beautiful map. Or not. Then, pause the game and save it.

name: Requiescat in Pace
description: Halo: Reach: Complete 10 assassinations on enemy players.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Complete 10 assassinations on enemy players.
tutorial: Start a custom game with a friend, and just assassinate them ten times. Or play normally and you'll eventually get it.

name: Run and Gunned
description: Halo: Reach: Headshot 10 enemies while they are sprinting.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Headshot 10 enemies while they are sprinting.
tutorial: Start a SWAT custom game with a friend, and just kill them while they sprint. Or play normally and you'll eventually get it.

name: Game Breaker
description: Halo: Reach: Kill 10 enemies while using a Jetpack.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Kill 10 enemies while using a Jetpack.
tutorial: Start a SWAT custom game with a friend, and just kill them while you are jetpackking. Or play normally and you'll eventually get it.

name: Because It Wasn't Hard Enough
description: Halo: Reach: Complete a Legendary campaign mission with 3 or more skulls enabled (Scoring Only).
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Complete a Legendary campaign mission with 3 or more skulls enabled (Scoring Only).
tutorial: Beat a mission with 3 skulls activated. Famine, Fog and Tough Luck are the easiest. And if you do it on Lone Wolf, you can just immediatly die and it will count as completing the mission!

name: Classic Completion
description: Halo: Reach: Complete Exodus without using any armor abilities.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Complete Exodus without using any armour abilities.
tutorial: Start Exodus with a friend (or 2nd controller) on Normal difficulty. Do not at any point use your armor ability. At the jetpack section, you will have to jump off of one another, and time some grenade jumps in order to make it pass the schism.

name: Confused Callouts
description: Halo: Reach: Trigger a humorous callout on your HUD's position indicator.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Trigger a humorous callout on your HUD's position indicator.
tutorial: On the map Boardwalk, walk to the 'Make Out Point' territory seen in the guide above.

name: Collection Eligibility Confirmed
description: Halo: Reach: See, he IS in the game!
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: See, he IS in the game!
tutorial: In the very ending cutscene of the Pillar of Autumn, while the camera is inside a hangar bay, hold the left thumbstick (or mouse) to the right and the camera will pan to a cryo tube with Master Chief in it.

name: Mind the Skill Gap
description: Halo: Reach: Observe the logo of a buttoned-up mining company.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Observe the logo of a buttoned-up mining company.
tutorial: Load up rally point Bravo, and at the mining facility just look at the massive BXR logo on the wall.

name: Easy to Overlook
description: Halo: Reach: Access hidden UNSC radio chatter.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Access hidden UNSC radio chatter.
tutorial: On Boardwalk, go the radio location seen in the guide above, and wait around it until you here the UNSC chatter.

name: New Ways to Save a Buck
description: Halo: Reach: Hear a familiar voice on New Alexandria.
lockedDescription: Halo: Reach: Hear a familiar voice on New Alexandria.
tutorial: On New Alexandria, you will need to get the side mission where you escort Buck. This is random, so keep playing the mission until you get it.
